content: क्रमः [क्रम्-भावकरणादौ घञ्] {@--1@} A step, pace; त्रिविक्रमः; सागरः प्लवगेंद्रेण क्रमेणैकेन लंघितः <ls>Mb.</ls>; <ls>Śi. 12. 18.</ls> {@--2@} A foot. {@--3@} Going, proceeding, course; कालक्रमेण; क्रमात् or क्रमेण in course of, gradually; कालक्रमेण gradually, in course of time; भाग्यक्रमः course or turn of fate; <ls>R. 3. 7</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">30</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">32.</ls> {@--4@} Performance, commencement; इत्थमत्र विततक्रमे क्रतौ <ls>Śi. 14. 53.</ls> {@--5@} ({%a%}) Regular course, order, series, succession; निमित्तनैमित्तकयोरयं क्रमः <ls>Ś. 7. 30</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 24</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">9. 85</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">2. 173</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 69.</ls> ({%b%}) Traditional order, <ls>U. 6.</ls> ({%c%}) Order of propriety; <ls>Ku. 5. 32.</ls> {@--6@} Method, manner; नेत्रत्रमेणोपरुरोध सूर्यं <ls>R. 7. 39.</ls> {@--7@} Grasp, hold; क्रमगता पशोः कन्यका <ls>Māl. 3. 18.</ls> {@--8@} A position of attack (assumed by an animal before making a spring); न मया क्रमः सज्जीकृत आसीत् <ls>Pt. 4.</ls> {@--9@} Preparation, readiness; <ls>Bk. 2. 9.</ls> {@--10@} An undertaking, enterprize. {@--11@} An act or deed, manner of proceeding; कोप्येष कांतः क्रमः <ls>Amaru. 43</ls>, <ls n="Amaru.">33.</ls> {@--12@} Particular manner of reciting Vedic texts, leaving at each time one word and taking up another. {@--13@} Power, strength. {@--14@} <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
